direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle string expressions and involve pattern matching with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods involve matching expressions against strings, though they perform different types of matching.
Both methods return a string representation of the expression, though for different purposes.
Both methods involve accessing and working with regular expressions.
Both methods modify the state of the ParameterTypeRegistry, which is a dependency for the target method.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the initialization of the ParameterTypeRegistry.
Setting up the expression string is required before creating the expression.
Both methods verify the type of expression and handle similar exceptions.
